name: Amazon Tales
overview: RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2012. The tribe is very annoyed with you. While you were going to vaccinate an elephant, you forgot to close the door on the enclosure. The elephant makes its way through to the heart of the Amazon jungle. Your mission is to recover the elephant, vaccinate it and bring it back to the hospital. During your travels, you will encounter various critters and jungle natives, armed with poisonous darts. Can you recover the elephant to avoid being thrown out of your tribe. Or will the jungle be too much for you?
